title: How To Make Films On A Phone
description: Want to level up your filmmaking skills with the S22 Ultra’s nightography features? Watch as Will Robson-Scott and our Samsung KX expert gives us insider knowledge on how to utilise your S22 device and capture your own unique perspective - even if you’re not an expert videographer or photographer!
